text: Thomas Boone Pickens (May 22, 1928 - September 11, 2019), known as T. Boone Pickens, was an American businessman and financier. Pickens was the chairman of BP Capital Management. p. 73. At the time of his death, Pickens had a net worth of $500 million. He was born in Holdenville, Oklahoma. Pickens died on September 11, 2019 in Dallas, Texas from stroke-related problems at the age of 91. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1928 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Philanthropists from Texas Category:American environmentalists Category:American chief executives Category:Businesspeople from Texas Category:Businesspeople from Oklahoma
title: T. Boone Pickens
